actions.in_committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways and Transit.

official_title: To provide for priority consideration for grade crossing safety improvements where there have been serious collisions.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Transportation, in providing assistance for projects to eliminate hazards of railway-highway crossings, to give priority consideration to emergency grade crossing safety improvements at railroad grade crossings where there have been multiple serious collisions.

titles.title: To provide for priority consideration for grade crossing safety improvements where there have been serious collisions.
